atm_fee.description: The ATM fee included in the authorization amount.

approved.description: Indicates if the authorization is approved.

balance_transactions.description: Balance transactions associated with the authorization.

object.description: String representing the object's type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

amount.description: Gross amount of this transaction (in cents (or local equivalent)). A positive value represents funds charged to another party, and a negative value represents funds sent to another party.

available_on.description: The date that the transaction's net funds become available in the Stripe balance.

created.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

description.description: An arbitrary string attached to the object. Often useful for displaying to users.

exchange_rate.description: If applicable, this transaction uses an exchange rate.

fee.description: Fees (in cents (or local equivalent)) paid for this transaction. Represented as a positive integer when assessed.

fee_details.description: Detailed breakdown of fees (in cents (or local equivalent)) paid for this transaction.

net.description: Net impact to a Stripe balance (in cents (or local equivalent)). A positive value represents incrementing a Stripe balance, and a negative value decrementing a Stripe balance.

reporting_category.description: Learn more about how reporting categories can help you understand balance transactions from an accounting perspective.

source.description: This transaction relates to the Stripe object.

status.description: The transaction's net funds status in the Stripe balance, which are either `available` or `pending`.

card.description: The card used for the authorization.

object.description: String representing the object's type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

account.description: The account this card belongs to.

address_country.description: Billing address country, if provided when creating card.

address_line1_check.description: If `address_line1` was provided, results of the check: `pass`, `fail`, `unavailable`, or `unchecked`.

address_zip_check.description: If `address_zip` was provided, results of the check: `pass`, `fail`, `unavailable`, or `unchecked`.

country.description: Two-letter ISO code representing the country of the card.

customer.description: The customer that this card belongs to.

cvc_check.description: If a CVC was provided, results of the check: `pass`, `fail`, `unavailable`, or `unchecked`.

dynamic_last4.description: The last four digits of the device account number.

exp_month.description: Two-digit number representing the card's expiration month.

exp_year.description: Four-digit number representing the card's expiration year.

fingerprint.description: Uniquely identifies this particular card number.

funding.description: Card funding type. Can be `credit`, `debit`, `prepaid`, or `unknown`.

last4.description: The last four digits of the card.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object.

tokenization_method.description: If the card number is tokenized, this is the method that was used.

created.description: Timestamp for when the authorization was created.

updated.description: Timestamp for when the authorization was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the authorization.

livemode.description: Indicates if the authorization is in live mode.

merchant_currency.description: The currency used by the merchant.

city.description: City where the merchant is located.

country.description: Country where the merchant is located.

state.description: State where the merchant is located.

metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the authorization.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, always 'authorization'.

pending_request.description: Details of a pending request for authorization.

amount.description: The amount requested in the pending request.

amount_details.description: Details about the amount in the pending request.

atm_fee.description: The ATM fee included in the pending request amount.

currency.description: The currency of the pending request.

is_amount_controllable.description: Indicates if the amount in the pending request is controllable.

merchant_amount.description: The amount in merchant's currency for the pending request.

merchant_currency.description: The currency used by the merchant for the pending request.

amount.description: The amount of the authorization request.

amount_details.description: Details about the authorization request amount.

atm_fee.description: The ATM fee included in the authorization request amount.

approved.description: Indicates if the authorization request was approved.

created.description: Timestamp for when the authorization request was created.

currency.description: The currency of the authorization request.

merchant_amount.description: The amount in merchant's currency for the authorization request.

merchant_currency.description: The currency used by the merchant for the authorization request.

atm_fee.description: The ATM fee included in the transaction amount.

balance_transaction.description: Balance transaction associated with the transaction.

card.description: The card used for the transaction.

cardholder.description: Details about the cardholder for the transaction.

created.description: Timestamp for when the transaction was created.

dispute.description: Any dispute related to the transaction.

id.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

livemode.description: Indicates if the transaction is in live mode.

merchant_amount.description: The amount in merchant's currency for the transaction.

merchant_currency.description: The currency used by the merchant for the transaction.

merchant_data.description: Data about the merchant for the transaction.

category.description: The category of the merchant for the transaction.

city.description: City where the merchant is located for the transaction.

country.description: Country where the merchant is located for the transaction.

name.description: Name of the merchant for the transaction.

network_id.description: Network ID of the merchant for the transaction.

postal_code.description: Postal code of the merchant for the transaction.

state.description: State where the merchant is located for the transaction.

metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the transaction.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, always 'transaction'.

purchase_details.description: Details about the purchase made in the transaction.

verification_data.description: Data related to verification of the authorization.

address_line1_check.description: Result of address line 1 check during verification.

address_postal_code_check.description: Result of postal code check during verification.

cvc_check.description: Result of CVC check during verification.

expiry_check.description: Result of expiry check during verification.

wallet.description: Information about the wallet used for the authorization.
